document_data.mainbody:
Fire daggers were a type of common enchanted simple weapons often found in Icewind Dale.
These simple-looking daggers possessed a +2 offensive enchantment as well as increased the wielders defense. Each his with this dagger had a change of lighting the target on fire.
Circa 1281 DR, several of these magic daggers could be found in Easthaven of the Ten Towns and in the depths of Dragons Eye on the Spine of the World.
